newsitem.title: FRANCE: Seita affected by cancer link report.
newsitem.headline: Seita affected by cancer link report.

text.p: Shares in French tobacco group Seita fell on Monday on the back of the publication of a study linking cigarette-smoking and lung cancer. At 1000 GMT, Seita stocks were down 3.69 percent at 196 francs.
U.S. tobacco shares fell on Friday on expectations of lower sales and more lawsuits against cigarette makers.
"People are looking at the U.S. situation and say that what's going to happen there is also going to have an impact here," said an analyst. But he added he believed the Seita share fall was overdone.
